thread.title: Kimberly Johnson
thread.title_full: BlueSun Vacations reviewed by Kimberly Johnson

author: Kimberly Johnson
title: Kimberly Johnson
text: Shane was genuine, not pushy and really cared about wanting my husband and I to have a wonderful vacation. We almost weren't able to go to a potential lay off and Shane didn't care about selling he was so thoughtful in an email he sent that showed me what kind of person he really is I can't say enough about Shane Benson and i will not work with anyone else unless he leaves the company. We are looking forward to our Dreams vacation and already planning Secrets vacation!!!
